General.Name: Zhen Ding Technology Holding Ltd
General.Description: Zhen Ding Technology Holding Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells various printed circuit board (PCB) products in the United States, Mainland China, Taiwan, Singapore, and internationally. The company offers flexible circuit boards, substrate-like PCBs, high-density interconnect PCBs, rigid printed circuit boards, IC substrates, rigid-flex PCBs, chip-on-films, and modules. Its products are used in various applications, including mobile phone, computer, wearable, AR/VR, smart home, other consumer, data center, base station, networking, and automotive and industrial. The company was formerly known as Foxconn Advanced Technology Limited and changed its name to Zhen Ding Technology Holding Limited in June 2011. Zhen Ding Technology Holding Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Grand Pavilion Hibiscus Way, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1205
